0a3b6461-70e2-48e4-acd9-91a8ea85e4dc_1: Drita's husband was locked up in jail.
0a3b6461-70e2-48e4-acd9-91a8ea85e4dc_2: She was awaiting him getting out soon.
0a3b6461-70e2-48e4-acd9-91a8ea85e4dc_3: When he finally got out, he was so different.
0a3b6461-70e2-48e4-acd9-91a8ea85e4dc_4: He was cold and aloof, and Drita fell out of love.
0a3b6461-70e2-48e4-acd9-91a8ea85e4dc_5: As soon as he found work, Drita kicked him out!

aee3adac-c42c-45ad-8a33-dd86eaa82a02_1: Johnny needed to buy new basketball shoes for his basketball league.
aee3adac-c42c-45ad-8a33-dd86eaa82a02_2: He went to the mall to look for a pair.
aee3adac-c42c-45ad-8a33-dd86eaa82a02_3: He picked out a pair of white shoes on sale for $50.
aee3adac-c42c-45ad-8a33-dd86eaa82a02_4: When he got home he tried on his shoes.
aee3adac-c42c-45ad-8a33-dd86eaa82a02_5: He played a game of basketball in his new shoes that same night.

e4b256a6-6c02-493e-8505-33e8a206f076_1: Mark was a missionary who was sent to North Korea.
e4b256a6-6c02-493e-8505-33e8a206f076_2: While there, he was placed in a hotel with state television.
e4b256a6-6c02-493e-8505-33e8a206f076_3: On state TV, reports came in that their famous astronaut had returned.
e4b256a6-6c02-493e-8505-33e8a206f076_4: The report said they were proud to have sent a man to Saturn.
e4b256a6-6c02-493e-8505-33e8a206f076_5: Mark was amazed at the deceit practiced by this regime.

ca71779a-062a-4259-a10d-8a3e4d24bb1f_1: Larry was up for a big promotion
ca71779a-062a-4259-a10d-8a3e4d24bb1f_2: He had already spent the money on a new pool.
ca71779a-062a-4259-a10d-8a3e4d24bb1f_3: When it came time for the promotion Larry didn't get it.
ca71779a-062a-4259-a10d-8a3e4d24bb1f_5: He went into debt over the pool.

d54cfc2c-de72-480b-ada5-e85ac78b927c_1: Anna was having her first baby.
d54cfc2c-de72-480b-ada5-e85ac78b927c_2: She did not want to use any drugs.
d54cfc2c-de72-480b-ada5-e85ac78b927c_4: She almost gave in, but she managed to resist.
d54cfc2c-de72-480b-ada5-e85ac78b927c_5: Afterwards, she was very proud of her resolve.

7afa7084-e4ed-4d7a-9ce0-526c4aad8b57_1: Me and my brother needed to get my mom a gift.
7afa7084-e4ed-4d7a-9ce0-526c4aad8b57_2: We knew she wanted a new tablet.
7afa7084-e4ed-4d7a-9ce0-526c4aad8b57_3: We decided to put our money together and get her the tablet.
7afa7084-e4ed-4d7a-9ce0-526c4aad8b57_4: Excited, we gave her the gift.
7afa7084-e4ed-4d7a-9ce0-526c4aad8b57_5: She was thrilled and cried when she saw what it was.

7ee7e5b9-082d-4391-ad50-0f420adccac7_1: I went to a barbecue at my uncle's house today.
7ee7e5b9-082d-4391-ad50-0f420adccac7_2: There was a bee flying around my food.
7ee7e5b9-082d-4391-ad50-0f420adccac7_3: I tried to swat it with my arm.
7ee7e5b9-082d-4391-ad50-0f420adccac7_4: The bee buzzed and stung me on the arm.
7ee7e5b9-082d-4391-ad50-0f420adccac7_5: I was in so much pain.

05dbb166-27d6-435f-97cd-cded5845717c_1: Shiloh is the third dog that I have owned.
05dbb166-27d6-435f-97cd-cded5845717c_2: She is the most loving and friendly dog ever!
05dbb166-27d6-435f-97cd-cded5845717c_3: Everytime I leave the house Shiloh misses me very much.
05dbb166-27d6-435f-97cd-cded5845717c_4: When I return home she greets me with a smile and wagging tail.
05dbb166-27d6-435f-97cd-cded5845717c_5: Shiloh makes it fun to come home.

c41e6c13-0edb-4572-8586-5dcfeba8ca8e_1: Bill was out one Friday afternoon and decided to go to a coffee shop.
c41e6c13-0edb-4572-8586-5dcfeba8ca8e_2: There, he ordered his favorite coffee drink, an iced caramel latte.
c41e6c13-0edb-4572-8586-5dcfeba8ca8e_3: He sat down to read a book, and he saw a man with the same book.
c41e6c13-0edb-4572-8586-5dcfeba8ca8e_4: They struck up a conversation about the book that lasted three hours.
c41e6c13-0edb-4572-8586-5dcfeba8ca8e_5: His name was Ted, and he was Bill's new best friend.

c625b65d-a703-4e87-92ad-334e01295e2a_1: Amy's friend Beth came for a visit from out of state.
c625b65d-a703-4e87-92ad-334e01295e2a_2: Amy was happy to see Beth after 2 years away.
c625b65d-a703-4e87-92ad-334e01295e2a_3: They went to the theater, and the museum.
c625b65d-a703-4e87-92ad-334e01295e2a_4: After 3 days Beth left and returned home.
c625b65d-a703-4e87-92ad-334e01295e2a_5: Amy was very happy with Beth's visit.
